item.title: Portfolio
item.description: College Projects A variety of projects relating to web design, programming and studies Project Languages Used Flight Booking System C# Cars Database Search Application C# Bake My Day HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP Data Search JavaScript, HTML, CSS Ad Zone PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript FlipSide Gaffs HTML, CSS, JavaScript Websites I have worked at design agencies, maintaining, updating and building websites according to the designs that were provoded to me.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Joey, an aspiring software developer, currently doing an apprenticeship which involves studying software development and working as a site reliablilty engineer. I have had a few different job roles such as a waiter, photographer customer support adviser and tech support adviser for my colleagues. My studies began with photgraphy, then web design which eventually led to web development and well, you can tell from my timeline of work in my portfolio where I aim to be in my career.
